DOC.brief_summary: Serum level bupivacaine time peri-articular injection mixture liposomal bupivacaine plain bupivacaine total knee arthroplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Serum Bupivacaine Concentration Levels After Injection Liposomal Bupivacaine Into Knee
DOC.criteria: Adults least 18 year age primary , unilateral total knee arthroplasty surgical plan intraarticular injection mixture 266 mg Exparel , 125 mg bupivacaine , 1:300,000 epinephrine , 0.9 % saline make total volume 100 ml . Known hepatic dysfunction renal insufficiency ( creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL ) ; allergy study medication ; pregnancy ; incarceration ; inability communicate investigator ; morbid obesity ( body mass index > 40 kg/m2 ) .
